content: Business name confusion: Our company appears on credit card statements as 'TechShop LLC' or 'ChargebackShield Merchant' but our website is GadgetStore.com. Many customers don't recognize the legal business name on their statement.

Subscription billing confusion: Monthly subscriptions renew automatically on the 1st of each month. Many customers forget they subscribed or don't realize it's recurring. We send email reminders 3 days before each charge.

Authorization hold confusion: When customers place an order, they may see two charges - one is an authorization hold that drops off in 3-5 days, the other is the actual charge. This is not a duplicate charge, it's standard payment processing.

Delivery timing confusion: Processing takes 2-3 business days, then shipping takes 5-7 business days. Total time is usually 7-10 business days. Weekends and holidays don't count as business days. International orders can take 2-3 weeks plus customs clearance time.

Tracking update confusion: Tracking numbers can take 24-48 hours to show up in the carrier's system after we create the shipping label. If tracking shows no updates, the package hasn't been scanned yet, not that it's lost.
